snippet.title: Banjo Kazooie The Hidden Lair - BK Romhack - World 1: Harvest Hills
snippet.description:
For those who don't want to or cannot play the demo themselves; here is a 100% playthrough of the first world of the Hidden Lair in its current state (things might change for the final release).

Banjo Kazooie The Hidden Lair is a passion project by me and Oldum77. It shows a possible continuation of the series; showing possible events after Banjo Tooie. It features a new area of the original Grunty's Lair, called the Hidden Lair. The goal is to have 9 worlds in the end. The hack aims to be close to vanilla in terms of feeling and charm. This is a BK hack, not for Banjo Tooie, so keep in mind that moves from that game are not present here.

Difficulty lies a bit above the vanilla game; obviously because we assume most people who play it will have played BK as well. However, it should still be relatively easy to beat. 100% can be quite tricky; many of the tokens and honeycombs are hidden quite well! Have fun!

Check this thread if you want to play the demo yourself: https://sixtyforums.com/showthread.php?tid=91

Direct download of demo patch: http://www.mediafire.com/file/uvlq11rt07p32bd/BKTheHiddenLairDEMO1a.xdelta/file
